DOC.detailed_description: This study aim develop , evaluate validate disease specific PROMs patient UK treat cardiac ablation cardiac arrhythmia . The potential benefit include support clinician improve performance , assist patient make informed choice strengthen audit research . Phase 1 study involve patient interview approximately 30 patient 2 site . These , together input multidisciplinary team , aim improve draft disease specific questionnaire . This follow Phase 2 trial questionnaire group approximately 600 patient three site . In Phase 2 patient ask complete pre-procedure questionnaire relating symptom , quality life procedure expectation . They also send post-procedure questionnaire relate procedural outcome , symptom quality life 8-16 week post procedure 1 5 year post-procedure . The response obtain PROMs use undertake recommend statistical test reliability validity .
